chunks.original_text: 散风和玉籁，飞烟骋六辔。 设兹遗万系，逍遥天地之问，极云八员之外，与道为邻矣。 先觉悟后觉 反流归一源。 劳多获少 终乖大乘。 四达 一日升达，有金苏珠玉，七宝官殿，同如玉京； 二日身达，体相具足，金刚无倾； 三日命达，年祚长短，一委三宝； 四日诚达，凶吉善恶，祸福苦乐，物我双忘，出登三清之上。 元形之状 善能窥。 智慧行六度 能超三界，度九幽苦，故名六□ 。 一日能勤，二日能信，三日能雌，四日能终，五日能炼冷，六日能奔酒色。 《消魔经》 故能解三罗
chunks.translated_text:
Scattering winds to harmonize jade flutes,
Flying mists racing with six reins.
Setting aside the myriad entanglements,
One roams freely between Heaven and Earth,
Beyond the eight limits of the clouds,
To dwell as a neighbor to the Dao.

Those who awaken first guide those who awaken later,
Turning the current back to the One Source.
Much toil yields little gain—
In the end, this strays from the Great Vehicle.

Fourfold attainment:
First, *ascendant attainment*—golden suzhou pearls and jade,
Seven-jeweled palaces,
Equal to the Jade Capital;
Second, *bodily attainment*—form and marks perfected,
Diamond-indestructible;
Third, *destined attainment*—lifespan’s length or brevity,
Entrusted wholly to the Three Treasures;
Fourth, *sincere attainment*—fortune and misfortune, good and evil,
Suffering and joy, self and other both forgotten,
Ascending beyond the Three Clarities.

The form of the Primordial Shape—
Those who are virtuous can glimpse it.
Wisdom practices the Six Perfections,
Transcending the Three Realms,
Delivering from the nine shades of suffering—
Thus it is called the Six [Virtues].

First, the power of diligence;
Second, the power of faith;
Third, the power of quiescence;
Fourth, the power of perseverance;
Fifth, the power of refining cold;
Sixth, the power of renouncing wine and lust.

The *Sutra of Dispelling Demons*—
Thus one dissolves the Three Nets.

chunks.original_text: 吐纳养云芽。 一通之人 百字不治。 二通之人，千言不改； 三通之人，万字不获； 四通之人，十方不易； 五通之人，百方不拘； 六通之人，千万大默。 非斯六人，不可制作。 不入正法，皆谓邪文。 六通 一日眼通，为洞视，视於三尊，不乱五色，无阴无阳，无小无大，无所不见。 二日耳通，为洞听，听受三宝，不滞五音，无清元浊，无缴元昧，无所不闻。 三日鼻通，为洞空，无故无新，无沉元浮，无不知别。 四日口通，为洞虚，愿尝甘露，妙法尤丹，不耆腥荤，无惧无畏，无刚无柔，无不辨行。 五日身通，为洞微，无广无狭，无内无外，元不究悉。 六日心通，为洞清，灌溉五神，荡涤十欲，无尊无卑，无道无俗，无不究明。 染之不着，以无上药治疗狂邪烧。 六觉之气，常通六慧 天洞视，地洞听，东洞空，西洞虚，南洞清，北洞浊。
chunks.translated_text:
Breathing nurtures the cloud-sprout.
Those of the first attainment—
A hundred words cannot cure them.
Those of the second attainment—
A thousand words cannot alter them.
Those of the third attainment—
Ten thousand words cannot reach them.
Those of the fourth attainment—
The ten directions cannot sway them.
Those of the fifth attainment—
A hundred methods cannot constrain them.
Those of the sixth attainment—
In utter silence, vast and boundless.
None but these six may compose true scripture.
All outside the Orthodox Dao are called deviant texts.

The Six Penetrations—
First, the eye’s penetration: *all-penetrating vision*,
Gazing upon the Three Honored Ones,
Undisturbed by the five colors,
Neither yin nor yang,
Neither small nor great,
Nothing unseen.

Second, the ear’s penetration: *all-penetrating hearing*,
Receiving the Three Treasures,
Unobstructed by the five tones,
Neither pure nor turbid,
Neither sharp nor dull,
Nothing unheard.

Third, the nose’s penetration: *all-penetrating emptiness*,
Neither old nor new,
Neither sinking nor floating,
All distinctions known.

Fourth, the mouth’s penetration: *all-penetrating void*,
Desiring to taste the sweet dew,
The wondrous Dharma surpassing cinnabar,
No craving for flesh or strong flavors,
Neither fear nor dread,
Neither hard nor soft,
No action unperceived.

Fifth, the body’s penetration: *all-penetrating subtlety*,
Neither broad nor narrow,
Neither inner nor outer,
All thoroughly fathomed.

Sixth, the mind’s penetration: *all-penetrating clarity*,
Irrigating the five spirits,
Scouring the ten desires,
Neither noble nor base,
Neither Dao nor worldly,
Nothing left unilluminated.

Unstained by defilement,
With the supreme medicine, one heals the madness of burning deviance.

The qi of the Six Awarenesses
Ever flows through the Six Wisdoms—
Heaven: *all-penetrating vision*,
Earth: *all-penetrating hearing*,
East: *all-penetrating emptiness*,
West: *all-penetrating void*,
South: *all-penetrating clarity*,
North: *all-penetrating turbidity*.

chunks.original_text: 此子致太极玉名 独步玉京，超凌三界，巍巍乎太山仙公之任矣。 玄都所涂，谅不虚也。 《本愿戒》 元中有妙 炼伪成真。 天设阴阳 三皇。 天帝君、南极上元君、太微天帝君、后圣九玄金阙帝君 清斋三月，玄思感於太寂，积念启於上清，逐□英停晖，九□纆经，隐芝结秀，宝光夜生，□淫落爽，元道进朋，咀爵太和，惠畅玉篇。 《太上素灵》 初来玉女非真也，使之 第四来玉女，鼻上有白玉如黍米许，真玉玄也。 灵皇鉴尔之用心，太极已注子於玉札 绿字紫虚之官，金书束华之阁，刻名上清丹文锦籍，为紫虚元君上清司命，又加名山之号，加封南岳夫人。 巍巍大真德，寂寂因无生 百竞烟起，万流分折，玄中觉德，自成圣真。
chunks.translated_text:
This adept bears the jade-name of the Supreme Ultimate,
Alone strides the Jade Capital,
Transcending the Three Realms—
How majestic the office of the Celestial Mountain’s Immortal Lord!

The markings of the Mysterious Metropolis are no empty boast.
*The Fundamental Vows and Precepts*:
Within the primordial lies the wondrous,
Refining the false into the true.
Heaven establishes yin and yang,
The Three Sovereigns.

The Heavenly Thearch Lord,
The Supreme Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen,
The Heavenly Thearch Lord of the Grand Tenuity,
The Posterior Sage’s Ninefold Mysterious Lord of the Golden Watchtower—
Having purified through fasting for three months,
Profound contemplation stirs the Great Stillness,
Accumulated devotion awakens the Supreme Clarity.
Thereupon, the radiance of jade halts its splendor,
The ninefold *mystic* scriptures coil in sequence,
Hidden mushrooms weave their blossoms,
Night-born treasure-light arises,
*Excess dissipates, clarity descends*,
The primordial Dao advances with its companions,
Sipping the nectar of Great Harmony,
Grace flows through the jade tablets.

*The Supreme Simplicity of the Numinous*:
The first jade maidens were not true—
Only the fourth jade maiden,
Upon whose nose rests a grain of white jade,
Is the true Mysterious Jade.
The Numinous Sovereign discerns your intent—
The Supreme Ultimate has inscribed your name upon the jade tablets,
In the Green Script and Purple Void’s palace,
The Golden Book and Floral-Bound Pavilion.
Your name is carved into the cinnabar script of the Supreme Clarity’s brocade register,
Appointed as the Supreme Void’s Primordial Lady,
Controller of Destinies of the Supreme Clarity,
Further bestowed the title of Mountain’s Honorific,
Ennobled as the Lady of the Southern Marchmount.

How majestic the virtue of the Great Perfected!
How still the cause of non-arising!
A hundred rivalries smoke and rise,
Ten thousand currents branch and diverge—
Yet within the Mysterious, the virtue of awakening
Self-accomplishes the sage and Perfected.

chunks.original_text: 大运之来大权 随时 受三天命 为世师者，皆行正法，受六天命。 为世师者，皆行龙法，无大无小，各有天命。 随世敦化，依时行藏，念念在心 九年精进，为太素真人，分形易体，千万须臾。 增成篇章 皆致深殃。 《琅书》 无无日道 义极玄玄。 玉京太上玉经 众经之祖。 太上令传诸仙公、仙王、仙伯、仙卿。 大法 四万劫传一人。 吾 受经成真，命三积授四人，并子五人矣。 《真一自然经诀》 金钱 传经法信写一通，传与一人、十人、百人、千人，卿本犹存。 《定志》 百万人中 有一人得此文，有仙文，有仙录，宿命也。 听四十年，传以此文，入诸名山，八极周游，天下鬼神无敢当之。 上士升仙，下士尸解。 《三皇》 侍经仙童 仙公请问。 受道不敬存师，则三官笑人 檀泄则七祖囚於狱，身履三恶之考。 王侯奉经 保宗庙，安国家。
chunks.translated_text:
The advent of the Great Cycle brings the Great Authority,
Following the times, one receives the mandate of the Three Heavens—
Those who serve as the world’s teachers all practice the Orthodox Dharma,
Receiving the mandate of the Six Heavens.
Those who serve as the world’s teachers all practice the Dragon Dharma,
Whether great or small, each bears a heavenly mandate.
Adapting to the world’s transformation, acting or concealing as the times demand,
Every thought resides in the heart.
Nine years of diligent cultivation make one a Perfected of the Great Simplicity,
Transforming form and altering substance in a thousand myriad instants.

To augment or complete the scriptures invites profound calamity.
The *Langshu* states:
*"The Way of No-Nothingness abides not even a day,
Its meaning reaches the utmost Mystery upon Mystery."*

The *Jade Capital’s Supreme Jade Sutra*
Is the ancestor of all scriptures.
The Supreme commands its transmission to the Lords, Kings, Earls, and Ministers of the Immortals.
This Great Dharma is transmitted to one person every forty thousand kalpas.

I, having received the scripture and attained Perfection,
Have commanded the Three Accumulations to bestow it upon four,
Together with you, making five.
The *True One’s Natural Scripture and Oral Instructions*:
As a token of transmission, inscribe one copy of the scripture,
Passing it to one, ten, a hundred, a thousand—
Yet the original text remains intact.

The *Fixed Resolve* states:
Among a million people,
One may obtain this text, possessing immortal scriptures and immortal registers—
Such is predestined fate.
After forty years of study, transmit this text,
Enter the famous mountains, wander the eight directions,
And none among heaven and earth’s spirits dare obstruct you.
The superior adept ascends as an immortal,
The lesser adept attains liberation through the corpse.

The *Three Sovereigns*:
The immortal youths attending the scripture,
The Lords of the Immortals inquire.
To receive the Dao without reverence or mindfulness of the master
Invites the Three Officials’ mockery.
To recklessly divulge it binds seven generations in the prisons of hell,
While the self suffers the trials of the Three Evils.

Kings and lords who uphold the scripture
Preserve their ancestral temples and secure their states.
chunks.overlap_context:
ipt of the Supreme Clarity’s brocade register,
Appointed as the Supreme Void’s Primordial Lady,
Controller of Destinies of the Supreme Clarity,
Further bestowed the title of Mountain’s Honorific,
Ennobled as the Lady of the Southern Marchmount.

How majestic the virtue of the Great Perfected!
How still the cause of non-arising!
A hundred rivalries smoke and rise,
Ten thousand currents branch and diverge—
Yet within the Mysterious, the virtue of awakening
Self-accomplishes the sage and Perfected.

chunks.original_text: 九微太真 传知惠经太极大法师，不太极高仙王。 无信而传经 谓之越天道。 无门而传，以泄天宝也。 法则天地 何等不生？ 何等不成？ 法则江河淮海何水不流？ 何川不行？ 上有仙相 中有人孝，下有才明，然后可受经。 一至之感 人神同开。 龙汉已来 至於赤明，九幽长夜，得解脱者，南陵官九都上格，悉有其名。 削灭九阴气 记上东华名。 八道望玄霞，七转纬天经 太上八素真。 一天之中 一人成太上，一人成帝君，一人成老子，一人成天师。 出三界，外济九天中 仙公得道，三师来度，如七宝山为日所照。 心开意解，香油纸笔 奉上福田。 盛德君子
chunks.translated_text:
The *Ninefold Subtle Supreme Perfection* transmits the *Scripture of Wisdom and Insight*:
The Grand Master of the Great Ultimate, the Lofty Immortal King of the Supreme Ultimate.
To transmit the scripture without faith is called transgressing the Dao of Heaven.
To transmit without proper lineage is to divulge Heaven’s treasures.
Patterned after Heaven and Earth—what does not arise? What does not come to fruition?
Patterned after the Yangtze, the Yellow River, the Huai, and the seas—what waters do not flow? What streams do not course?

Only when one bears the immortal countenance above,
Filial piety within,
And wisdom and clarity below
May one receive the scripture.
A single moment of sincerity—
Human and divine alike respond in kind.

From the Dragon Han era to the Crimson Brightness,
Through the long night of the Nine Dark Realms,
Those who attained liberation—
Their names are all inscribed in the Southern Mound Palace, the Nine Capitals, and the Upper Registers.
Eradicating the qi of the Nine Yin,
Their names are recorded in the Eastern Florescence.

Gazing toward the Eight Paths of the Mystic Radiance,
Seven revolutions of the Heaven-Weaving Scripture—
The Supreme Eightfold Simplicity Perfected.
Within a single heaven:
One becomes the Most High,
One becomes the Lord Sovereign,
One becomes Laozi,
One becomes the Heavenly Master.
Emerging from the Three Realms,
Externally aiding the Nine Heavens—
The Lords of the Immortals attain the Dao,
The Three Masters come to deliver,
As the Seven Jeweled Mountain is illumined by the sun.

With heart opened and mind enlightened,
Offer fragrant oil, paper, and brush
To the field of blessings.
O noble one of abundant virtue!

chunks.original_text: 斋金宝奉真文。 三洞法师一人 胜黄赤道十一千。 丹晖映云庭，紫烟曜玉林 焕烂七宝笔，璀璨摇灵音。 官商自相和，清香散人襟。 积道成仙 龟山。 丹皇飞玄紫文 泡玉毋所宝。 真道之名 帝图玉箓。 迥天九霄，白简青箓 上圣帝君受於九空，结飞玄带气自然之字，记后学得仙之名，刻书广灵之堂，自非上圣，莫能通读。 七十年后，题昆仑之密北洞之源，字方一丈。 仙阶 九都之上，主格玉书题得道人名。 学者名参青宫，但无金简玉字 领仙侍郎典录玉司，其能勤尚，皆奏名玉皇，三元东华太上当遣授其真经，后圣众真莫不先奏金简於束华，投玉札於上清，然后得受《大洞真经》。 未学之徒，青篇无金录之名，玉格无玄文之字，神经不可得披，玉女不卫身矣。 学真人受玄清八素经 皆有太帝，录名西华官，有琅简药书於紫官，当为真人未生前五千岁已有玄定录，当遇此书。 八素金髓玉骨，高玄之妙道，玉清之秘篇 皆授金名玉字，高仙之人。 天王玄鉴，七圣刻篇，西龟定录，东华书名，玄图帝简，名书青宫 九天王遣四极真人下授琼文帝章。 南极上元 宝秘玉检之文，无金简玉髓，名录帝图，不得见篇第。 无金名兰台 丹字紫房，不见其文。 上皇民籍定真玉录 三天正一先生所佩，以定得仙之名也。 青童君日 天录显於青官，气候诊於躯形，绿字彰於太极，心神正於紫房。 有金阁主名 则眼有日光，青齿白血。 其为人也，仁慈而乐仙，明颖而秀拔。 上清有金书玉录 则背有如河魁，胸前有偃骨。 太极有丹简青文 则手有累人倒大之字。 方诸有玄素紫名者 则眼有四规中有紫光。 太清有玉籍绛名者 则声有玉音，口方日圆。 太清有琼简金书者 则白志於腹，口中有紫气。 南极有丹文紫录者 则头生五气，上接重楼之云。 斗中有玄玉录籍 丹心紫孔，黄华绕胃，口中香气，齿多玉液。 少好视日月之流霞，乐星辰之光象。 玄都丹台有白玉金字 则青肝紫络，苍肾绫文。 其膺精溢，身体香软。 三元宫有琳札青书者 紫脑锦舌，玄志鬓际，绿肠朱髓，方天圆额。 阴有伏骨，孔门三关； 眼有流光，青精凝液。 掌文曲菌，齿牙三锷，爱水怀山，宝魄养魂，诸有此相，叉上仙也。 其次鼻上有玄山黑志是也 又当腹有玄丘，以对其山。 赤黑志也。 青骨
chunks.translated_text:
Offering gold and treasures to present the Writ of the Perfected.
One Master of the Three Caverns—
Surpassing the Yellow and Red Dao by eleven thousand.
Cinnabar radiance illumines the Cloud Court,
Purple mist glows in the Jade Grove.
Resplendent, the Seven Jeweled Brush,
Dazzling, it sways with numinous sound.
Gong and shang harmonize of themselves,
Pure fragrance scatters upon one’s lapels.

Through accumulated Dao, one becomes an immortal of Tortoise Mountain.
The Cinnabar Sovereign soars with the Dark Purple Writ—
Bubbling Jade, unpossessed treasure.
The name of the True Dao:
The Emperor’s Chart and Jade Register.
In the distant heavens of the Nine Empyreans,
White tablets and blue-green registers—
The Supreme Sage Lord receives them in the Nine Voids,
Binding the Flying Dark Sash with qi’s spontaneous script,
Recording the names of later students who attain immortality,
Inscribing them in the Hall of Vast Numinosity.
None but the Supreme Sages can comprehend or read them.
After seventy years,
They are inscribed at the northern source of Kunlun’s secret cavern,
Each character a zhang in size.

The Immortal Stair ascends above the Nine Capitals,
Where the Jade Register’s main ledger records the names of those who attain the Dao.
The student’s name is entered in the Azure Palace,
Yet without a gold tablet or jade script,
One cannot be appointed Immortal Attendant or Director of the Jade Bureau.
Those who are diligent and reverent—
All have their names memorialized to the Jade Emperor,
And the Three Primes and Eastern Florescence of the Most High then dispatch the transmission of their true scriptures.
None among the later sages and host of Perfected fail first to present a gold tablet to Eastern Florescence,
Or cast a jade missive to the Upper Clarity,
Before receiving the *Great Cavern Perfected Scripture*.
Unlearned disciples—
Their blue-green scrolls bear no name in the Gold Register,
Their jade ledgers no script of the Dark Writ.
They cannot unfold the divine scriptures,
Nor will jade maidens guard their bodies.

Those who study the Perfected receive the *Eight Simplicities Scripture of Dark Clarity*—
All have the Supreme Emperor,
Their names recorded in the Western Florescence Palace,
Where jade tablets and medicinal texts are kept in the Purple Palace.
As True Persons, five thousand years before their birth,
They already possessed the Dark Fixed Register,
And were destined to encounter this scripture.
The *Eight Simplicities* of gold marrow and jade bone,
The wondrous Dao of the Lofty Dark,
The secret scrolls of Jade Clarity—
All are conferred upon those of gold names and jade script,
The lofty immortals.

The Heavenly King’s Dark Mirror,
The Seven Sages’ inscribed scrolls,
The Western Tortoise’s fixed register,
The Eastern Florescence’s recorded names,
The Dark Chart and Emperor’s Tablet,
Names inscribed in the Azure Palace—
The Nine Heavenly Kings dispatch the Four Poles’ True Persons
To bestow the imperial writs of jasper script.
The Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen—
The treasured secret writs of jade seals—
Without gold tablets or jade marrow,
Without names recorded in the Emperor’s Chart,
One cannot behold the scrolls’ sequence.
Without a gold name in the Orchid Terrace,
Or cinnabar script in the Purple Chamber,
One cannot see its texts.

The Supreme August’s register of the people’s destiny fixes the True Jade Record.
The Three Heavens’ Orthodox Unity Masters wear it
To determine the names of those who attain immortality.
The Azure Lad daily declares:
The Heavenly Record manifests in the Azure Palace,
Qi and seasons are diagnosed in bodily form,
Green script shines in the Great Ultimate,
The heart’s spirit is rectified in the Purple Chamber.
One who has a name in the Gold Pavilion—
Their eyes possess sunlight,
Their teeth are green, their blood white.
Such a person is benevolent and delights in immortality,
Bright and keen, outstanding and transcendent.

If the Upper Clarity has a gold book and jade record,
Their back bears a mark like the River Chariot,
Their chest has recumbent bones.
If the Great Ultimate has cinnabar tablets and blue-green script,
Their hands bear the characters of "accumulated person" and "inverted great."
If the Square Cauldron has a dark simplicity and purple name,
Their eyes have four rings with purple light within.
If the Grand Clarity has a jade register and crimson name,
Their voice has jade resonance, their mouth square, their eyes round.
If the Grand Clarity has jasper tablets and gold script,
Their belly is white-willed, their mouth emits purple qi.
If the Southern Culmen has cinnabar script and purple records,
Their head generates five qi, ascending to the layered clouds.
If the Dipper contains a dark jade register,
Their heart is cinnabar, their apertures purple,
Yellow blossoms encircle their stomach,
Their mouth exhales fragrant qi, their teeth overflow with jade liquid.
From youth, they delight in gazing at the flowing clouds of sun and moon,
And rejoice in the luminous images of stars and constellations.

If the Dark Capital’s Cinnabar Terrace has white jade and gold script,
Their liver is green, their sinews purple,
Their kidneys azure with patterned veins.
Their breast brims with essence, their body is fragrant and supple.
If the Three Primes Palace has jade missives and blue-green script,
Their brain is purple, their tongue brocade,
Their will dark at the temples,
Their intestines green, their marrow vermilion,
Their forehead square, their brow round.
Their yin possesses hidden bones,
Their apertures three barriers;
Their eyes emit flowing light,
Green essence congeals into liquid.
Their palms bear the curves of fungi,
Their teeth three-edged,
They cherish water and embrace mountains,
Treasure their po and nurture their hun.
All who possess these marks are destined to become highest immortals.

Those next have a dark mountain and black will upon their nose—
Their belly must also have a dark mound to correspond to that mountain,
A red and black will.
Green bones...

chunks.original_text: 乐闻五香之气，好学神仙之事。 鹄行龙趋 项生，忌枕耳后。 伏晨肺下有青志，体生络文，心真胆静，耳坚气宽。 玄州亦有黄金刻名之籍。 其次太山三宫 玄录白籍有生之乡，不注有死之地。 太阴诸死生有黑录白簿赤丹编简。 真数得六千简，辄注一人无死地。 景林真人语华存日 今见子之质，霄景高焕，圆精重照，凤骨贯脑，九色宝曜，五藏紫结，心有明文，是以形栖辰霞，神交灵肆。 《紫虚元君内传》 上清道宝经卷之一竟 上清道宝经卷之二 天品第三 玄象灵文，莫过三五 日月北斗为三，五星为五。 一大 为天字，即大一也。 天覆地载，万物生其中间也。 天地，大道之常 天常一天，道常一道，气变为九，故曰九天，天八十一天。 天有三玄 日月星也，上为三精。 紫天精之天 处太元之中，三元之气在上景之衢。 三光在上 为天文字。 灾有三品 一火、二水、三风。 天下无常，岂有坚固？ 大变已后，四日、五日出时，江河枯，大海竭。 复六日出，万物皆尽，譬如脂膏，天地破，绝阴阳。 九后复更生，大风从他方日月天地问来，持云上第十一天，上下大如两车轮。 数千万岁，天雨积水上至第十一天，下四面皆有大水，又有大风围守，持之令不溢，大风吹水，数千亿万岁，水生厚沬，化为七宝：一黄金，二白银，三瑠璃，四水精，五珊瑚，六好玉，七砗磲。 乱风吹其七宝，上至第十一天上，下至第十三天下，造作九重天，天人所居处。 后乱风吹水，波沬凝作七宝，乱风聚於天中，造作须弥罗宝太山，高三百三十万里。 复聚七宝，水精黄金，造日王城郭七重。 复聚二宝，白银瑠璃，造月王城郭七重。 复聚一宝，名水精，持上行高四十万里，造诸天下神所居处。 大风制持而行之，譬如浮云，名之为星。 大者围四百八十里，小者四十里。 复聚七百须弥罗宝太山，四方造八重宝山，黄金白银等，乱风以余水化作厚土，其上沬化作刚铁太山，高六百七十二万里，即三皇官。 大圣尊神 尚不知五十有五天，但说四十有九重天也。 分上六天寄於道气，道乃在三天之上，罗天之外，从下初得一天，名益天，号日清明。 三天最上天，名太上元极大道高益天，号日元上三天。 玉京台 在乎无上大罗之上，若存若亡，若有若无。 大罗夭 琼琳翼冲玄，日月焕灵干。 飞天梵绿气，驾景乘紫烟。 郁郁拔出文，纷纷灵宝仙。 三清之天 在三界之外。 仙人居太清，真人居上清，圣人居玉清，各有自然官殿。 三天 大赤天，号太清，洞虚之气接下品； 禹余天，号上清，紫虚之气接中品； 清微天，号玉清，玉虚之气接上品。 出生死海，登无漏山 到太请岸，领正法流，四望玄绝，故名洞玄，望中之极，难可宣示。 行玉清之道 出则诸天仙卫轩，给玉童玉女，建五色之节，驾紫云耕十二琼较，前导凤歌，后从玄剑，六师启涂，飞龙翼较，位准高仙。 行上清之道 出则五宿侍卫，给玉童玉女各八百人，建五色之节，驾龙舆飞烟，前啸九凤，后吹八鸾，白此启导，太极胜轩，故真中有高下，升玄有阶次。 太元连玉清，三曜洞高明 八风回晨风，金映冠天精，玉华结五老，紫烟运霄耕，乘气荡玄房委顺技出经。 逍遥上清 十万劫若诸天之一日。 《真一自然诀》 竦身凌太清，超景逸紫霄
chunks.translated_text:
Those who delight in the fragrance of the Five Perfumes and are eager to study the affairs of divine immortals—
They walk like cranes and move like dragons,
Their necks bear growths, and they avoid resting their ears upon pillows.
Beneath their morning-concealed lungs lies a blue *zhi*,
Their bodies bear networked patterns,
Their hearts are true, their gallbladders serene,
Their ears firm, their *qi* expansive.
The Dark Province also holds registers inscribed with golden names.

Next are the Three Palaces of Mount Tai,
Where the Dark Record and White Register mark the land of the living,
Not inscribing the realm of the dead.
The Great Yin’s records of life and death are kept in black ledgers, white scrolls, and cinnabar-bound bamboo slips.
When the true tally reaches six thousand slips,
Each person is inscribed in the land beyond death.

Master Jinglin spoke to Hua Cun:
"Now I see your essence—radiant as the dawn, luminous and resplendent,
Your round spirit shines with layered brilliance,
Phoenix bones pierce your brain,
Nine-colored jewel-lights,
Five viscera bound in purple,
Your heart bears bright script.
Thus, your form dwells among celestial mists,
Your spirit communes with the numinous realm."

*The Inner Transmission of the Purple Void Primordial Sovereign*
*Upper Clarity Scripture of the Dao-Treasures, Scroll One* (conclusion)

*Upper Clarity Scripture of the Dao-Treasures, Scroll Two*
**Heavenly Rank, Third Chapter**

No divine writ surpasses the Three and Five:
The sun, moon, and Northern Dipper as Three,
The five stars as Five.
The Great One
Is the celestial script, the Primordial Unity.
Heaven covers, earth bears,
All things arise between them.
Heaven and earth are the constancy of the Great Dao—
Heaven’s constancy is the One Heaven,
The Dao’s constancy is the One Dao.
*Qi* transforms into nine,
Thus there are the Nine Heavens,
Eighty-one heavens in all.

Heaven has Three Mysteries:
The sun, moon, and stars,
Above which are the Three Essences.
The Heaven of Purple Celestial Essence
Abides within the Great Primordium,
The *qi* of the Three Primes above the path of the Upper Radiance.
The Three Luminaries above
Form the celestial script.

Disasters have three ranks:
First fire, second water, third wind.
Nothing under heaven is eternal—how could anything be unyielding?
After the great transformation,
When four or five suns rise,
Rivers and streams dry, the great seas run empty.
When six suns rise,
All things perish,
Like rendered fat.
Heaven and earth shatter, yin and yang cease.
After nine generations, life begins anew.
A great wind comes from another realm, from between the sun, moon, heaven, and earth,
Bearing clouds to the Eleventh Heaven,
Above and below vast as two chariot wheels.
For tens of millions of years,
Heaven rains, and the waters rise to the Eleventh Heaven,
Surrounding it on all sides with great floods,
Held in place by encircling winds that prevent overflow.
The winds blow the waters for billions of years,
Generating thick foam that transforms into seven treasures:
First yellow gold, second white silver, third lapis lazuli,
Fourth crystal, fifth coral, sixth fine jade, seventh giant clam.
Chaotic winds scatter these seven treasures,
Up to the Eleventh Heaven,
Down to the Thirteenth Heaven,
Fashioning the Ninefold Heavens,
Where the heavenly people dwell.
Later, the winds blow the waters,
And the foam congeals into seven treasures,
Gathered in the heavens to form Mount Sumeru of jeweled treasure,
Three million three hundred thousand *li* high.
Again, the seven treasures—crystal and yellow gold—
Are gathered to build the sevenfold city walls of the Sun King.
Again, two treasures—white silver and lapis lazuli—
Are gathered to build the sevenfold city walls of the Moon King.
Again, one treasure—crystal—
Is raised forty thousand *li* high
To build the abodes of the gods beneath the heavens.
The great winds govern and propel them,
Like floating clouds,
Called stars.
The largest span four hundred eighty *li*,
The smallest forty *li*.
Again, seven hundred Mount Sumerus of jeweled treasure
Are gathered on four sides to form eightfold treasure mountains—
Yellow gold, white silver, and the like.
The winds transform the remaining waters into thick earth,
Whose foam hardens into adamantine mountains,
Six million seven hundred twenty thousand *li* high,
The palace of the Three Sovereigns.

The Great Sage and Venerable Spirit
Knew not of fifty-five heavens,
But spoke only of forty-nine layers of heaven.
The upper six heavens are lodged within the *qi* of the Dao,
For the Dao resides above the Three Heavens,
Beyond the Heavenly Web.
From the lowest, one attains the first heaven,
Named Yi Heaven, styled "Luminous Clarity."
The highest of the Three Heavens
Is named Supreme Primordial Ultimate Great Dao High Yi Heaven,
Styled "Primordial Upper Three Heavens."

The Jade Capital Terrace
Floats above the Supreme Great Heavenly Web,
Now present, now absent,
Now existent, now nonexistent.
The Great Heavenly Web—
Jade and forest wings surge through the mysterious,
Sun and moon gleam with numinous splendor.
Flying immortals ride emerald *qi*,
Mounting radiance and riding purple mist.
Lush and luxuriant, they emerge from the script,
In profusion—divine treasure immortals.

The Three Clarities’ Heavens
Lie beyond the Three Realms.
Immortals dwell in the Great Clarity,
Perfected Ones in the Upper Clarity,
Sages in the Jade Clarity,
Each with their own natural palaces.

The Three Heavens:
Great Crimson Heaven, styled Great Clarity,
Its cavernous emptiness *qi* connects to the lower rank;
Yu Yu Heaven, styled Upper Clarity,
Its purple emptiness *qi* connects to the middle rank;
Clear Tenuity Heaven, styled Jade Clarity,
Its jade emptiness *qi* connects to the upper rank.

Emerging from the sea of life and death,
Ascending the mountain of non-leakage,
Arriving at the shore of the Great Clarity,
Receiving the flow of the true Dharma,
Gazing into the four directions—profound and boundless—
Thus it is called Cavernous Mystery.
The ultimate within the gaze
Is difficult to proclaim.

Practicing the Way of the Jade Clarity,
One emerges with all the heavens’ immortals as an escort,
Attended by jade lads and jade maidens,
Bearing five-colored banners,
Riding purple clouds and driving twelve jade dragons,
Phoenix songs leading the way,
Mystic swords following behind,
The Six Masters opening the path,
Flying dragons flanking the chariot—
A rank equal to the highest immortals.

Practicing the Way of the Upper Clarity,
One emerges with the Five Constellations as an escort,
Attended by eight hundred jade lads and maidens each,
Bearing five-colored banners,
Riding a dragon chariot through flying mist,
Nine phoenixes wailing ahead,
Eight simurghs singing behind,
The White Origin opening the way,
The Supreme Ultimate’s victorious chariot—
Thus, among the perfected there are high and low,
And in ascending the mysterious, there are steps and ranks.

The Great Primordium links to the Jade Clarity,
The Three Luminaries illumine the high and bright.
The Eight Winds revolve the morning breeze,
Golden light crowns the celestial essence,
Jade splendor binds the Five Elders,
Purple mist drives the celestial plow.
Riding the *qi*, swaying through the mysterious chambers,
Yielding to the branches, emerging from the script.
Roaming freely in the Upper Clarity—
A hundred thousand kalpas are but a single day in the heavens.

*The True One’s Natural Formula*
Rising in body to the Great Clarity,
Transcending radiance and soaring beyond the purple dawn.

chunks.original_text: 万劫犹昨夜，千桩如晨朝。 戒智弘太混，玄阶兴扶摇。 三气生三 故号九天。 九天之根，以三为尊。 九天之天，与上三天合为十二气。 第一无上元景无色天，玄清 上气天。 玄梵 玉虚天。 上虚 赤天。 大梵 玄元天。 玉空 玄洞寂然天。 宝梵无色 玄妙天 云梵 流精中元天。 玄上 无崖天。 大梵 玄精青天。 紫虚 上元天。 大梵 九天中无道德天。 九灵 气天。 无名至极 梵声天。 蝉然 天。 空梵 中天。 太极无崖 紫虚洞幽天。 绿梵 自然天。 四天 之音 三十六天 同名生於空洞元气之先，题於昆仑之山，高上音其玉文，上相集其妙篇。 上标玄图，中纯六司三十六音，下总九地三十六土皇。 灵篇洞畅，玉音灵鲜，皆天王之游歌，空玄之宝章，六六韵合，四四齐真，九九帝分，号三十六天，上极无崖无极，下极洞源洞渊。 诸上真飞仙不禀玉音，不得游观无崖之文。 有得其文，玉书书名，刻字紫札，结录玉晨，三十六年，刻得上仙，上登元色之天，下洞九地之源。 如银如玉 得冷色身。
chunks.translated_text:
Ten thousand kalpas are but last night,
A thousand pillars like the morning court.
Precepts and wisdom magnify the Great Primal Chaos,
The mysterious steps rise on the whirlwind’s lift.

Three *qi* beget three—
Thus are the Nine Heavens named.
The root of the Nine Heavens
Holds three as supreme.
The heavens of the Nine Heavens,
With the Three Upper Heavens, form the Twelve *Qi*.

First, the Supreme Primordial Radiance, the Formless Heaven—
The Upper *Qi* of the Mysterious Clarity.
The Mysterious Brahma, Jade Void Heaven.
The Upper Void, Crimson Heaven.
The Great Brahma, Mysterious Origin Heaven.
Jade Emptiness, the Profound and Still Heaven.
Treasure Brahma, the Formless Mysterious Wonder Heaven.
Cloud Brahma, the Flowing Essence of the Middle Primordium Heaven.
The Upper Profound, the Boundless Heaven.
The Great Brahma, the Mysterious Essence Azure Heaven.
Purple Void, the Upper Primordium Heaven.
The Great Brahma, the Dao-Virtueless Heaven among the Nine Heavens.
Nine Spirits, the *Qi* Heaven.
The Nameless Utmost Extreme, the Brahma-Voice Heaven.
The Cicada-Silent Heaven.
Empty Brahma, the Central Heaven.
The Supreme Ultimate, the Boundless Purple Void Profound Heaven.
Verdant Brahma, the Natural Heaven.

The Four Heavenly Sounds—
The Thirty-Six Heavens share their names,
Born before the primordial *qi* of the Hollow Void,
Inscribed upon Kunlun’s mountain.
The Highest Ones chant their jade scriptures,
The Upper Ministers gather their wondrous chapters.
Above, they mark the Mysterious Chart;
Within, they hold pure the Six Offices and Thirty-Six Sounds;
Below, they govern the Nine Lands and Thirty-Six Earthly Sovereigns.

The numinous chapters flow unimpeded,
The jade tones gleam with spirit-freshness—
All are the wandering songs of the Heavenly Kings,
The treasured scriptures of the Hollow Mystery.
Six by six, their rhymes unite;
Four by four, they align with the perfected.
Nine by nine, the emperors divide—
Thus are the Thirty-Six Heavens named,
Above reaching the boundless and infinite,
Below plumbing the fathomless abyss of the Hollow Source.

None among the flying immortals and transcendent perfected
Who do not receive the jade tones
May wander and behold the boundless scriptures.
Those who obtain the scriptures,
Whose names are inscribed in jade books,
Whose characters are carved on purple tablets,
Whose records are bound in the Jade Dawn—
After thirty-six years of carving,
They attain the rank of Upper Immortal,
Ascending to the Heaven of Primordial Radiance above,
Plumbing the Nine Lands’ source below.
Like silver, like jade—
They gain a body of cold-hued essence.

chunks.original_text: 六天魔王 一赤虚天，二泰清都天，三浩天，四太玄天，五太玄苍天，六太清天。 混洞太无元高上玉皇之气，赤混太无元上玉虚之气，冥寂玄通元上玉虚之气 年殊号异，本同一也。 无光无象，无形无名，无色无绪，无音无声，积阳成天，积滞成地。 三气为天地之尊，九气为天地之根。 三合成德，天地之极。 五行列位 纲维八极天地长短。 上气日始，其色正青； 中气日元，其色正白； 下气日玄，其色正黄。 太和之气太冥 在九天之上谓冥气，极远绝，平九玄，唯读大洞玉经可以交接，然后玉帝乘丹霄而启道，太冥披绿霞而朗焕，金堵之馆既盈，云珠之庭受真矣。 三元宫中 有三华之气生，似芙蓉之晖，玄采虚空之中。 元辰之中有金阙，其中有上景之气。 气色郁郁，紫烟雾焉，晖照十方，云荫金阙，乃后圣之所会。 结气成紫如晖 丹霄映监天，罗布西南回。 三晨明七曜，列宿朗太微。 三一元君 各有真气，结成千乘万骑、云车羽盖也。 二十四神之正气 散之则为云雾，合之则为形影，出之为仙化，入之为真一，上结三元，下结万物。 二气离合，理物有期。 三道亏盈，出处因运 后圣九玄道君列纪。 日者阳之精，德之长 德者，万物归焉。 日出东方，万物亦出於东方，日盛於南方，日入西方，藏於北方，万物皆随之。 日家在南，位在午。 五月阴气起於内，小杀也。 日纵广二千三十里 金分，水精晕於内，流光照於外。
chunks.translated_text:
The Six Demon Kings of Heaven:
First, the Crimson Void Heaven;
Second, the Supreme Clarity Capital Heaven;
Third, the Vast Heaven;
Fourth, the Great Mystery Heaven;
Fifth, the Great Mystery Azure Heaven;
Sixth, the Great Clarity Heaven.

The qi of the Primordial Highest Jade Emperor of the Primal Cavern’s Great Non-Being,
The qi of the Crimson Primal Non-Being’s Highest Jade Void,
The qi of the Dark Serene Mysterious Pervasion’s Highest Jade Void—
Though their years differ and their names vary, their root is one.

Without light, without form,
Without shape, without name,
Without color, without trace,
Without sound, without voice—
Accumulated yang forms heaven,
Accumulated stagnation forms earth.

The Three Qi are the honor of heaven and earth,
The Nine Qi are the root of heaven and earth.
The Three unite to perfect virtue,
The ultimate of heaven and earth.

The Five Phases array their positions,
The warp and weft of the Eight Poles—
Heaven and earth’s length and breadth.
The upper qi is the Beginning of Day, its color true azure;
The middle qi is the Origin, its color true white;
The lower qi is the Mysterious, its color true yellow.

The qi of Supreme Harmony, the Great Obscurity,
Lies above the Nine Heavens—termed the Obscure Qi,
Utterly remote and cut off,
Balancing the Nine Mysteries.
Only by reciting the *Great Cavern Jade Scripture* may one commune with it,
Whereupon the Jade Emperor mounts the Cinnabar Clouds to initiate the Dao,
The Great Obscurity dons green radiance and shines resplendent.
The halls of golden ramparts fill,
The courtyards of cloud-pearls receive the perfected.

Within the Three Primordials’ Palace,
The qi of Three Flowers arises,
Like the radiance of hibiscus,
Mysterious hues in the void.
Within the Origin’s Celestial Cycle,
There is a Golden Watchtower,
Wherein dwells the qi of the Upper Effulgence.
Its qi and color luxuriant,
Purple mists swirl,
Its brilliance illumines the ten directions,
Clouds shade the Golden Watchtower—
The gathering place of later sages.

Condensed qi forms purple radiance,
Cinnabar clouds mirror the azure sky,
Spread in the southwest’s turning.
The Three Mornings brighten the Seven Luminaries,
The constellations array the Grand Tenuity.

The Three Ones’ Primordial Lords
Each possess true qi,
Forming a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders,
Cloud carriages and feathered canopies.

The upright qi of the Twenty-Four Spirits—
Scattered, it becomes clouds and mist;
Gathered, it becomes form and shadow.
Issuing forth, it transforms into immortals;
Entering in, it becomes the True One.
Above, it binds the Three Primordials;
Below, it binds the myriad things.

The two qi part and unite,
Governing things in their seasons.
The Three Ways wax and wane,
Emergence and retreat follow fate—
The Nine Mysteries’ Dao Lords of Later Sages arrange the records.

The sun is the essence of yang, the eldest of virtue.
Virtue is that to which the myriad things return.
The sun rises in the east, and the myriad things also emerge in the east;
The sun flourishes in the south,
Sets in the west,
Hides in the north—
All things follow it.
The sun’s home is in the south, its position at noon.
In the fifth month, yin qi stirs within—
A minor waning.

The sun’s breadth spans two thousand thirty *li*,
Golden divisions,
Water essence’s halo within,
Flowing light shining without.

chunks.original_text: 其中城郭人民，七宝浴池，生青黄白莲花。 人长二丈四尺，衣朱衣之服，花同衰同盛。 日行有五风，故制御日月，星宿游行皆成之梵。 其纲也，金门之上，日行通门也，金门之内有金精冶炼之池，在西关也，左之分。 故立春之日，更炼魄於金门之内，曜其光於金门之外，四十五日乃止。 顺行至洞阳官，是日之上馆。 立夏日止於洞阳官，吐金冶之精，以灌东井之中，沐浴於景晖，收八素之气，归广寒之官，三十五日至广寒官，是月之上馆，七星之华盖。 立冬日，伏日精於广寒之官，一年日运同度，冠带四乡，二景离合，阴阳亏盈。 日月者，天地之司徒空也 《老子历藏中经》 日姓张，名表，字长史 《三皇》 日月王宫殿城
chunks.translated_text:
Within it lie walled cities and people, seven-jeweled bathing pools, where blue, yellow, and white lotuses bloom. The people stand twenty-four feet tall, clad in crimson robes, their flowering synchronized in decline and flourishing. Five winds govern the sun’s movement, thus ordering the sun, moon, and constellations in their celestial courses—all perfected by Brahmā.

Its framework: above the Golden Gate, the sun’s passage is the Open Portal. Within the Golden Gate lies the Pool of Refined Golden Essence, situated at the western pass, to the left of the division. Thus, on the day of *Lìchūn*, the solar spirit is further refined within the Golden Gate, its radiance shining beyond for forty-five days before ceasing. It proceeds in sequence to the Cavern-Yang Palace, the sun’s upper abode. On the day of *Lìxià*, it halts at the Cavern-Yang Palace, exhaling the essence of molten gold to irrigate the Eastern Well, bathing in the luminous splendor. Gathering the Eight Pure qi, it returns to the Palace of Vast Cold, arriving in thirty-five days—the moon’s upper abode beneath the Seven Stars’ floral canopy.

On the day of *Lìdōng*, the solar essence lies concealed within the Palace of Vast Cold. The sun’s yearly circuit completes its measure, crowned and girded in the four directions. The Two Luminaries part and unite; yin and yang wax and wane.

The sun and moon are the celestial and terrestrial ministers of emptiness.

From *Laozi’s Esoteric Canon of the Calendar*:
The sun’s surname is Zhāng, personal name Biǎo, courtesy name Chángshǐ.

From *The Three Sovereigns*:
The Sun-Moon King’s palaces and walled cities.

chunks.original_text: 东西南北二千四十里，城有七重，问有竹木树。 城有四门，城中池树有凤皇朱雀飞乌之类，乱风造日王所居处。 黄金官殿在城中央，城上四面复有黄金楼阁，高下有四十里。 第五十天上有人来下为日天王，出大光明，照四面金楼，生五百光明，明照四方，诸天人寿九百万岁也。 九天真人 呼日为濯曜罗，三天真人呼日为圆光蔚，太素天中呼日为妙景，皇上真人呼日为九曜生，皇上常乘明玉之轮转，宴於日中，太清诸仙呼日为大明，太极真人呼日为明圆。 皇初，紫元之天中常有晖晖之光，薄如薄雾，乃九日之所出，有如一月之照耳。 玉贤天中呼日为微玄。 日月华者，曜晖灵之华芒也。 赤气王者，日中之上神，名曰将车梁知赤气王名者，不死飞上清。 老君呼日为太宝，九华东华真人呼日为紫曜明，或日员昧。 日精赤 圆形而方景，常以一月五过於金门之上，以金精石景水母之英，炼於日魂，曜精八芒也。 丹炉丹气 圆天育精，刚以受柔。 炎水阴英，日辰元景，号日大明。 九阳齐化，二烟俱生。 凝神和魂，和气之精，中生五帝，乘光御形，首巾龙华，被朱带青，鸾乌流玄，霞映上青。 日中青帝 讳圆常元，字照龙韬。 衣青玉锦，帔苍华飞羽裙。 日中赤帝 讳丹灵峙，字绿虹映。 衣绛玉锦，帔丹华飞羽裙。 日中白帝 讳皓郁将，字回金霞。 衣素玉锦，帔白羽飞华裙。 日中黑帝 讳澄漕停，字玄绿炎。 衣玄玉锦，帔黑羽飞华裙。 日中黄帝 讳寿逸阜，字飘晖像。 衣黄玉锦，帔黄羽飞华裙。 日中夫人魂精内神，名暧萧台，操九真中。 月家在北 位属子，故十一月万物生地下。 月纵广二千九百里 月晖圆七千八百四十里，白银琉璃水精映内，一分六十，炎光明照於其中。 城郭人民，亦有七宝浴池，八骞之林生乎其内。 月中之人长一丈六尺，衣青色之衣。 月中之人常以月一日至十六日探白银琉璃，炼於炎光之冶，故月度盈则光明鲜大。 常以十七日至二十九日於骞林之下探三气之华，拂日月之光。 秋分之日，月宿东井之上广灵之堂，沐浴东井之池，以炼月魂，明八朗之芒，受阳精於日晖，吐黄气於玉池，诸天人悉探玉树之华，以拂日月之光，月以黄气灌天人之容。 秋分是天人会之日。 冬至日，月伏广寒之上馆，育养月魂於广寒之池，纳黄气於玉胞，吐阳精於寒池，诸天人探青华之林以拂日月之光，月以阳精灌天人之容。 春分日，月宿於金门之上，则月通灵之门也。 月於金精冶炼池更炼於石景水母，营饰於光华，灌阳精於金门，纳黄气於玉泉，诸天人探骞树之华以拂日月之光，日以黄气灌天人之容。 夏至之日，月伏洞阳官，是日之上馆，月之流火之庭，冶炼於八芒，鲜明於日魂，灌黄气於洞阳，纳阳精於火官，八素真人皆采空青之林以拂日月之光，月以阳精灌天人之容。 月姓文，名申，字子光 《三皇》 月天王所居琉璃官殿 城上四面黄金楼阁，高六百四十里，第十五天人下为月天王，出大光明，转照天下，未曾休息也。 八骞 月中树，一名药王，凡有八树。 月光黄 方精而圆象，运回而盈，度周而倾。

The eastern, western, southern, and northern spans measure two thousand and forty *li*. The walled city has seven concentric layers, each adorned with bamboo, trees, and groves. The city’s four gates enclose pools and forests where phoenixes, vermilion birds, and flying crows dwell—this is the chaotic wind’s domain and the Sun King’s abode.

At the city’s center stands a palace of yellow gold. On all four sides of the city walls rise golden towers and pavilions, their heights and depths spanning forty *li*. On the fiftieth heaven, beings descend to become the Sun Heavenly King, radiating great luminosity that illuminates the golden towers on all sides, generating five hundred beams of light to shine upon the four directions. The celestial beings of these heavens live for nine million years.

The Perfected of the Nine Heavens call the sun *Zhuóyào Luó*; the Perfected of the Three Heavens call it *Yuánguāng Wèi*; in the Heaven of Grand Simplicity, it is named *Miàojǐng*; the Supreme Perfected call it *Jiǔyào Shēng*. The Supreme Perfected constantly rides the luminous jade wheel, feasting within the sun. The immortals of Great Clarity call the sun *Dàmíng*; the Perfected of the Great Ultimate call it *Míngyuán*.

In the primordial era, within the Heaven of Purple Prime, there was ever a radiant glow, thin as mist—this was the origin of the nine suns, their light akin to that of a single moon. In the Heaven of Jade Worthies, the sun is called *Wēixuán*.

The radiance of the sun and moon is the effulgent bloom of their numinous brilliance. The Crimson Qi King is the divine spirit above the sun, named *Jiāngchē Liángzhī*. Those who know the name of the Crimson Qi King will not die but ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Lord Lao calls the sun *Tàibǎo*; the Nine Radiance Eastern Perfected call it *Zǐyào Míng*, or sometimes *Yuánmèi*.

The sun’s essence is crimson, square in form yet round in radiance. Each month, it passes five times above the Golden Gate, where the essence of gold, stone radiance, and the water-mother’s flower are refined within the sun’s soul, casting forth eight rays of luminous essence.

The Cinnabar Crucible’s cinnabar qi nurtures celestial essence, firm yet receptive to the yielding. The yin bloom of scorching water, the sun’s primal radiance, is called *Dàmíng*. Nine yang forces coalesce, and twin vapors arise together. Concentrating the spirit and harmonizing the soul, the essence of harmonious qi gives birth to the Five Emperors within. They ride the light to govern form, their heads crowned with dragon-flower kerchiefs, clad in crimson sashes and azure robes. Simurghs and crows flow in mystery, their rosy glow suffusing the azure above.

The Azure Emperor within the sun, whose taboo name is *Yuáncháng Yuán* and courtesy name *Zhàolóng Tāo*, wears a robe of azure-jade brocade and a cape of verdant, feathered splendor.

The Vermilion Emperor within the sun, whose taboo name is *Dānlíng Zhì* and courtesy name *Lǜhóng Yìng*, wears a robe of crimson-jade brocade and a cape of vermilion, feathered splendor.

The White Emperor within the sun, whose taboo name is *Hàoyù Jiāng* and courtesy name *Huíjīn Xiá*, wears a robe of white-jade brocade and a cape of white, feathered splendor.

The Black Emperor within the sun, whose taboo name is *Chéngcáo Tíng* and courtesy name *Xuánlǜ Yán*, wears a robe of black-jade brocade and a cape of black, feathered splendor.

The Yellow Emperor within the sun, whose taboo name is *Shòuyì Fù* and courtesy name *Piāohuī Xiàng*, wears a robe of yellow-jade brocade and a cape of yellow, feathered splendor.

The sun’s inner spirit, the Lady of the Solar Soul, is named *Àixiāo Tái* and governs the Nine Perfected within.

The moon’s domain lies in the north, corresponding to the *zǐ* position; thus, in the eleventh month, the myriad things germinate beneath the earth. The moon’s breadth spans two thousand nine hundred *li*, while its radiant circumference measures seven thousand eight hundred and forty *li*. Within, white silver, lapis lazuli, and crystal reflect one another, divided into sixty parts, their scorching brilliance illuminating the interior. The city walls and populace are arrayed with seven-jeweled bathing pools and forests of eight *qiān* trees growing within.

The people of the moon stand sixteen feet tall, clad in garments of azure hue. From the first to the sixteenth day of the month, they gather white silver and lapis lazuli, refining them in the crucible of scorching light—thus, as the moon waxes, its luminosity grows bright and vast. From the seventeenth to the twenty-ninth day, beneath the *qiān* forests, they gather the blossoms of the three qi to brush the light of the sun and moon.

On the autumnal equinox, the moon lodges above the Eastern Well in the Hall of Vast Spirit, bathing in the Eastern Well’s pool to refine the lunar soul, brightening the eightfold radiance of clarity. It receives the yang essence from the sun’s brilliance and exhales yellow qi into the Jade Pool. All celestial beings gather the blossoms of the jade trees to brush the light of the sun and moon, while the moon’s yellow qi washes the countenances of the heavenly beings. The autumnal equinox is the day of the celestial assembly.

On the winter solstice, the moon rests in the upper lodge of Vast Cold, nurturing the lunar soul in the Vast Cold’s pool. It absorbs yellow qi into the jade womb and exhales yang essence into the frigid pool. All celestial beings gather the blossoms of the azure forests to brush the light of the sun and moon, while the moon’s yang essence washes the countenances of the heavenly beings.

On the vernal equinox, the moon lodges above the Golden Gate—this is the moon’s gate of numinous communion. Within the crucible of golden essence, it refines the pool of stone radiance and water-mother, adorning its luminous splendor. It irrigates the Golden Gate with yang essence and absorbs yellow qi into the Jade Spring. All celestial beings gather the blossoms of the *qiān* trees to brush the light of the sun and moon, while the sun’s yellow qi washes the countenances of the heavenly beings.

On the summer solstice, the moon rests in the Cavern-Yang Palace, the upper lodge of the day and the moon’s flowing fire court. It refines the eight rays, brightening the solar soul, irrigating the Cavern-Yang with yellow qi, and absorbing yang essence into the Fire Palace. The Eight Pure Perfected all gather the forests of azure emptiness to brush the light of the sun and moon, while the moon’s yang essence washes the countenances of the heavenly beings.

The moon’s surname is *Wén*, personal name *Shēn*, courtesy name *Zǐguāng*. From *The Three Sovereigns*: The Moon Heavenly King’s abode is a palace of lapis lazuli. On all four sides of the city walls rise golden towers and pavilions, six hundred and forty *li* in height. Beings from the fifteenth heaven descend to become the Moon Heavenly King, radiating great luminosity to illuminate the world without cease.

The *Eight Qiān*—trees of the moon, also called the King of Medicines—comprise eight trees in total.

The moon’s radiance is yellow, square in essence yet round in form, revolving and waxing, its circuit complete yet ever waning.

chunks.original_text: 常以月五日、十五日、二十五日经东井之上沐浴灵晖，营饰精芒，鲜明黄华。 玄昱散王灵 中真乘空郁，三素启圆涂，黄华曜朱月。 月中青帝夫人 讳娥隐珠，字苓艳婴。 衣青华琼锦，帔翠龙凤文飞羽裙。 月中赤帝夫人 讳翳逸寥，字婉延虚。 衣丹药玉锦，帔朱华凤络飞羽裙。 月中白帝夫人 讳灵素兰，字郁连华。 衣琳四出龙锦，帔素羽厉章飞华裙。 月中黑帝夫人 讳结连翘，字停渟金。 衣琅九道云锦，帔黑羽龙文飞华裙。 月中黄帝夫人 讳青营襟，字炅定容。 衣黄云山文锦，帔绿扶羽凤华绣裙。 九星 九天之灵根，日月之明梁，万品之渊宫。 天有九气，以九星为灵纽； 地有九州，以九星为神主； 人有九孔，以九星为命府； 阴阳九官，以九星为门户； 五岳四海，以九星为渊府。 五九参列，回转三辰，调理四气。 上帝兼之以通真，神仙凭之以得成，五行乘之以致度，万品禀之以得生。 天清地静，九星焕明。 天激地否，九星翳昏。 璇玑召劫度之期，天关运五行之气。 第一天枢星 阳明星之魂神也，天枢威而不曜，光而不照，潜洞太虚，圆九百二十里。 对阳明星之西北门，其星号魁精玄。 上真皇夫人姓明通，讳上真，头作飞云之髻，衣紫黄青锦襦，带九铃之绶，口吐青气之光。 第二天旋星 阴精星之魂神，照而不焕，潜洞太虚，圆五百五十里。

On the fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of each lunar cycle, the moon bathes in the numinous radiance above the Eastern Well, adorning its essence and refining its luminous brilliance, so that its golden splendor shines anew. The Dark Canopy scatters the numinous majesty of the King of Spirits; the Three Purities open the circular path, and the golden blossom illumines the vermilion moon.

**Lady of the Bluegreen Emperor in the Moon**
Her taboo name is *Éyǐnzhū*, her style *Língyàn Yīng*. She wears a robe of azure-flowered jade brocade and a shawl of kingfisher-green embroidered with soaring dragons and phoenixes.

**Lady of the Red Emperor in the Moon**
Her taboo name is *Yìyìliáo*, her style *Wǎnyán Xū*. She wears a robe of cinnabar-and-jade brocade and a shawl of vermilion-flowered phoenix-patterned gauze.

**Lady of the White Emperor in the Moon**
Her taboo name is *Língsùlán*, her style *Yùlián Huá*. She wears a robe of fourfold dragon brocade woven with jade and a shawl of white feathered embroidery.

**Lady of the Black Emperor in the Moon**
Her taboo name is *Jiéliánqiáo*, her style *Tíngtíng Jīn*. She wears a robe of ninefold cloud brocade and a shawl of black feathered dragon-patterned gauze.

**Lady of the Yellow Emperor in the Moon**
Her taboo name is *Qīngyíng Jīn*, her style *Jiǒngdìng Róng*. She wears a robe of yellow cloud-and-mountain brocade and a shawl of green phoenix-feathered embroidery.

**The Nine Stars**
The Nine Stars are the numinous roots of the Nine Heavens, the luminous beams of the sun and moon, the abyssal palace of the ten thousand kinds. Heaven possesses nine *qi*, with the Nine Stars as their spiritual pivot; Earth possesses nine provinces, with the Nine Stars as their divine sovereign; humans possess nine orifices, with the Nine Stars as the mansion of destiny; the nine palaces of yin and yang have the Nine Stars as their gates; the Five Peaks and Four Seas have the Nine Stars as their abyssal palace. The Five Nines array in ranks, revolving through the Three Luminaries to harmonize the Four *Qi*. The Supreme Emperor employs them to commune with the perfected; immortals rely on them to attain transcendence; the Five Phases ride them to achieve their measures; the ten thousand kinds receive them to attain life. When heaven is clear and earth is still, the Nine Stars blaze with brilliance. When heaven is turbulent and earth obstructed, the Nine Stars darken and dim. The Jade Armillary summons the kalpa’s destined cycles; the Celestial Pass governs the *qi* of the Five Phases.

**The First Star: Celestial Pivot**
The spirit-soul of the Yang Brilliance Star, the Celestial Pivot is majestic yet does not blaze, luminous yet does not shine. It permeates the Great Void, spanning nine hundred and twenty *li*. Opposite the northwest gate of the Yang Brilliance Star, this star is called *Kuí Jīng Xuán*. The August Lady of the Supreme Perfected, surnamed *Míngtōng* and taboo-named *Shàngzhēn*, wears her hair in a soaring-cloud chignon. She is clad in a robe of purple, yellow, and azure brocade, girdled with a nine-belled sash, and exhales a radiance of blue-green *qi*.

**The Second Star: Celestial Rotation**
The spirit-soul of the Yin Essence Star, it shines yet does not blaze, permeating the Great Void with a span of five hundred and fifty *li*.

Opposite the northeastern gate of the Cinnabar Prime Star, this star is called *Běi Shàng Jīn Gài*. The Central August Lady, surnamed *Yuánfāng* and taboo-named *Bójīng*, wears a purple-morning flying-flower crown, a nine-colored robe, and a divine-tiger jade-patterned sash.

**The Sixth Star: Celestial Gatekeeper**
The spirit-essence of the Northern Culmen Star, its numinous radiance latent yet illuminating. Opposite the lower gate of the Northern Culmen—the gate of the Northern Grotto—this star is called *Ān Shàng Chén Huá*. The Primordial August Lady, surnamed *Wángyuán* and taboo-named *Mínghuì*, wears a jade-morning crown, a flying-cyan feathered robe, and a flowing-gold fire-bell sash.

**The Seventh Star: Jade Brilliance**
The soul of the Celestial Pass Star, the Great Luminance. Its light revolves through the hollow void, turning the mechanism of the Celestial Pass. Above, it faces the southern gate of the Celestial Pass Star; below, it aligns with the Northern Culmen Star. This star is called *Yù Huá*. The Numinous August Lady wears a flying-flower cloud-tousled coiffure, a seven-hued night-luminous cloud-brocade skirt, and a nine-heaven awe-inspiring talisman.

**The Eighth Star: Grotto Radiance**
The soul-essence of the Auxiliary Star, the Yang Luminance. Its light revolves through all heavens. Above, it faces the southwestern gate of the Auxiliary Star, situated above the Celestial Pass, the *Liáng*, the yang ray of the Northern Culmen. This star is called *Dà Míng*. The Eternal August Lady wears a flying-cloud flower-tousled coiffure, a flying-gauze cloud robe, a nine-luminance sash, and exhales the light of cyan *qi*.

**The Ninth Star: Hidden Prime**
The luminous essence of the Adjuvant Star, the Hollow Numinous. Concealed beneath the canopy of latent breath, its hidden light shines within the hollow void. Above, it faces the southeastern gate of the Adjuvant Star. This star is called *Kōng Xuán Biàn Yún*. The Supreme August Lady wears a seven-tiered flying-heaven treasure crown, a cyan-patterned brocade robe, a nine-luminance night-candle sash, and exhales the essence of black *qi*.

**Yang Brightness Star**
The Celestial Grand Commandant, governing administration and rectifying transgressions. Above, it oversees the perfected of the Nine Heavens; in the middle, it supervises the flying immortals of the Five Peaks; below, it leads the later-disciples among the perfected—all of *liuli* water essence. Within it stands a jade tree bearing cyan fruit with golden-winged ravens perched upon its branches, spontaneously growing cyan-jade numinous mushrooms. One bite grants a lifespan of ninety thousand years. The star possesses nine gates, each with four *qi*, illuminating nine hundred million *li*. Within lies a cyan-walled jade tower, where the Dipper Perfected, titled the Nine Mornings Lord, wears a cyan-feather flying robe, holds the Dipper’s chart in hand, and sits within the jade tower.

**Yin Essence Star**
The Celestial Grand Steward, governing emoluments and ranks. Above, it oversees the celestial lodges; below, it leads the ten thousand spirits—all of *liuli* water essence. Within its jade tower grow black fruit, spontaneously bearing dark mushrooms and jade embryos. Consuming them grants a lifespan of fifty thousand years. The star possesses five gates, each with four lights, illuminating nine hundred million *li*. Within stands a five-hued jade tower, where the Northern Culmen Perfected, the Northern Supreme Morning Lord, wears a dark-essence jade crown, a dark-feather flying robe, holds a five-hued feathered staff, and sits within the jade tower.

**Perfected Person Star**
The Celestial Controller of Destinies, governing the affairs of gods and immortals. Above, it oversees the Nine Heavens; in the middle, it supervises the numinous immortals of the Five Peaks. Within its jade tower, yellow blossoms grow spontaneously, along with yellow essence and jade mushrooms. Consuming them grants a lifespan of thirty million years. The star possesses twelve gates, each with four lights, and above stands a yellow terrace jade tower. The Perfected, titled the Sun Immortal Florescence Morning Lord, holds the Dipper’s green register and records lives within the jade tower.

**Profound Darkness Star**
The Celestial Vanguard, governing the punishment of rebels. Above, it oversees the ghosts of the Nine Heavens; in the middle, it leads the Three Officials of the Northern Thearch; below, it monitors the myriad multitudes. Within it stands a vermilion tree bearing red fruit, spontaneously growing cinnabar mushrooms and *liuli*. Consuming them grants a lifespan of eight thousand years. The star possesses three gates, each with four lights, and above stands a vermilion terrace jade tower. The Dipper-Stepping Perfected, titled the Mystic Supreme Flying Canopy Morning Lord, wears a cinnabar-brocade flying robe, holds the life-numinous staff, and sits within the jade tower.

**Cinnabar Prime Star**
The Celestial Dipper Lord, governing the registers of destiny. Above, it oversees the Nine Heavens. Within it stands a vermilion tree bearing white fruit, spontaneously producing golden essence refined into an unguent. The star possesses seven gates, each with four lights, and above stands a plain terrace golden tower. The Perfected, titled the Golden Culmen Seven Mornings Lord, holds the green register of the nameless.

**Northern Culmen Star**

chunks.original_text: 天之太常，主升进，上总九天上真，中统五岳飞仙。 中有李树白子，生芝玄水瑛，食之寿五万年。 星有八门，门中有玄台玉楼。 步刚真人号北辰飞华君，手执北斗玉策。 天关星 天之上帝，主天地机运、四时长短。 中有三华之树、五色之实，生自然九味芝膏，服之身生九色之光，上有九层玉楼，乘龙真人号总灵九元北盖辰君，手执晖神之策，坐玉楼之中。 辅星 天尊玉帝之星，上总九天，下领九地。 中有青华之树，自生九音之字，有青乌，三足之乌，生琉璃之英，食一口得与玉帝同真。 有八门，交通八气。 中有紫气玉楼游行三界，真人号帝尊九晨君，手执火铃。 弼星 大帝真星，主变化无方。 中有三华之树，自生九天玉帝。 上有金口之凤，口衔火铃。 中有自然七曜之晖。 星有九门，交天市中，有玉台紫馆，徘徊三阳。 真人号日帝真元晨，衣九天龙衣，手执帝章，坐紫馆中。 九斗者，天极之正盖，玄轴之华宝 机钮八维，总旋九度，真把大象，以匿霞包斗，魂以生身。 左驾绿云，右辔绛晨，身升太素。 七星 去地四十九万里，皆金精琉璃为其郭，七曜紫晖焰其光。 其内诸天人众真，游宴於是馆。 一昼一夜，同天一度，如日月之轮。 其内亦生七宝朱林，人定之后生气之初，七星受炼於广寒之官，明鲜紫景於七曜之晖。 当此之时，七曜焕落，流精竟天，紫景吐津，以灌诸天。 於是，众真探紫景之兰、七曜之光化为七童子，一童子讳枢明，二讳曜灵，三讳北元，四讳宝精，五讳丹婴，六讳灵清，七讳紫瑛，即七宝之内精，化为七曜之真也。 太上真一君 左手把北斗星之柄，右手把北辰之刚。 北极不动之星，谓为辰刚。 五星者 日月之灵根，天胎之五藏，天精结缠以成五星。 天气不育，三合亏盈。 《八素经》 岁星

The Heavenly Grand Constancy governs ascension and advancement, overseeing the Perfected of the Nine Heavens above and commanding the Flying Immortals of the Five Peaks below. Above stands a nine-tiered jade tower. The Dragon-Riding Perfected, titled the All-Numinous Nine Origins Northern Canopy Aster Lord, holds the Radiant Spirit Scepter and sits within the jade tower.

The Heavenly Venerable Jade Emperor’s star, overseeing the Nine Heavens above and ruling the Nine Earths below. Within it stands a blue-flowered tree, spontaneously generating nine-toned script. A blue crow—a three-legged crow—produces lapis lazuli blossoms; one bite grants union with the Jade Emperor’s Perfection. It possesses eight gates, through which the eight qi interflow. Within, a purple-qi jade tower traverses the Three Realms. The Perfected, titled the Imperial Venerable Nine Mornings Lord, holds a fire bell.

The Great Emperor’s Perfected Star, governing boundless transformation. Within it stands a triple-flowered tree, spontaneously birthing the Jade Emperor of the Nine Heavens. The star possesses nine gates, intersecting the Celestial Market, where a jade terrace and purple palace wander through the Three Yangs. The Perfected, titled the Imperial Perfected Origin Morning Lord, wears the Nine Heavens Dragon Robe, holds the Imperial Insignia, and sits within the purple palace.

The Nine Dippers form the true canopy of the Celestial Culmen, the flowering treasure of the Mystic Axis. Their mechanism turns the Eight Directions, revolving the Nine Degrees, grasping the Great Image, enfolding the Dipper in mist and wrapping the soul to generate the body. To the left, they harness green clouds; to the right, they rein in the crimson dawn, ascending to the Grand Simplicity.

Forty-nine myriad li from Earth, their walls are forged of golden essence and lapis lazuli, their light kindled by the purple radiance of the Seven Luminaries. Within also grow seven-jeweled vermilion groves. At the hour of settled meditation, when generative qi first stirs, the Seven Stars undergo refinement in the Palace of Broad Coldness, their luminous purple effulgence mingling with the radiance of the Seven Luminaries. At this moment, the Seven Luminaries blaze and scatter, their essence streaming across the heavens, their purple effulgence spilling forth to irrigate all heavens. Thereupon, the Perfected gather the purple-orchid effulgence and the light of the Seven Luminaries, which transform into seven youths: the first named Pivot Bright, the second Radiant Spirit, the third Northern Origin, the fourth Treasure Essence, the fifth Cinnabar Infant, the sixth Numinous Purity, and the seventh Purple Jade—these are the inner essences of the Seven Treasures, metamorphosed into the Perfected of the Seven Luminaries.

**Supreme Perfected Unity Lord**
In his left hand, he grasps the handle of the Northern Dipper; in his right, the firmness of the Northern Aster. The unmoving star of the Northern Culmen is called Aster Firmness.

**Five Stars**
The spiritual roots of the sun and moon, the five viscera of the Celestial Embryo, the Five Stars formed by the intertwining of celestial essence. When Heaven’s qi fails to nurture, the Three Conjunctions wane and wax.

*The Eight Simplicities Scripture*

chunks.original_text: 圆镜木精，玄朗束阳之陕。 星中有九门，门有一青帝，几九青帝，奉卫中央青皇真君。 真黄者，东方之上真，始精天尊神门内青帝，或号青灵之公，或青神或青精，或青帝之君也。 火星 圆镜丹精，星中有三门，门内有一赤帝，几三赤帝，奉卫南山皇真君。 赤黄者，南方之上真，丹官之贵神。 其星中有赤君者，或号赤灵之公，或赤神，或赤精，或赤帝之君也。 太白星 圆镜金精，焕曜西神。 星中有七门，门内有白帝，凡七白帝，卫於西真上皇君。 白皇君者，西方之上真，太素之尊皇。 门内白帝君，号日白灵之公，或白神，或白精，或白帝之君也。 辰星 圆镜水精，洞映北淇。 星中有五门，门有一黑帝，凡五黑帝，并卫北真上皇。 玄真皇者，北方之上真，太玄之尊君，备门黑帝，号为黑灵之公，或黑神，或黑精，或黑帝之君也。 镇星 圆镜土精，镇应黄道。 星中有四门，门有一黄帝，几四黄帝，奉卫镇无黄真君。 中央黄真上皇者，上极之高尊，守门黄帝，号黄灵之公，或黄神，或黄精，或黄帝之君也。 三光 绿道而行，着於天而照八极，众星居其处，五星察其过失。

chunks.original_text: 其人行德，德星守之； 行武，武星守之； 行柔，柔星守之； 行强，强星守之； 行信，信星守之。 迭昼玄中趣，湛湛清汉波。 九天生神章，朱童度苦河 灵章技难，七玄升轩，十转登汉。 七色宝云 《云书度命》。 昆仑山气五色 《老子藏经》 庆云 所屯者，为云营也。 上清玉房生七宝之云，云色十重，其气九扇，唯童子宣弥得乘此宝云，上入玉清之天。 辟非者，太微之内神，宣弥者玉清之神也。 三元君之出游也 白日倾曜，八风洞波，连晖九万，高霄舞晨，绛霞郁敷，黄云七晖。 紫蕾吐晖 绛霞敷天，三景高照，诸天光明。 九色之云 紫碧二色之云，五色紫云三素之云，玄灵丹霞，绿青三色之云。 《龟山元录》 早云八素紫云 七素绛云，六气绿云，五素青云朗。 《太洞真经》 庆霄四会 八道焕明，三景齐照，九气朗清。 育精之宫 有上华之室，室中青气，号为反香之烟，逆风三千里而闻此香。 十华诸仙，集紫烟结成宫，元始於碧琼空歌 大浮黎土，坐碧霞之上。 大微帝君 生於明霞之内，五云缠络，更号玉虚，凝真固液，万思玄霞以自运，念游霄以登空，御玄晨於十天，骋飞电陕控龙，积思成真，其次省要以示青童君。 东方青霞，讳飞虚； 西方白霞，讳素虚； 南方赤霞，讳知映； 北方黑霞，讳玄象； 中央黄霞，讳总生。 能知五霞讳，降致飞耕，朝夕存念，玄霄来迎，乘空上升造太清。 庆霄重飞，朱兰吐葩 流丹上回，灌精玉霞。 绿霞吐津 罗布太空，紫虚结烟，徘徊丹房，三晖洞明，七曜流光。 紫霞映帝席 五云曜九玄，八风起绝宇，幽清绿轩间。 七色宝霞下皇之老饮七辰灵之雾 餐洞天之光。 青白之露

Those who cultivate virtue are guarded by the Star of Virtue; those who cultivate martial prowess are guarded by the Star of Valor; those who cultivate gentleness are guarded by the Star of Gentleness; those who cultivate strength are guarded by the Star of Strength; those who cultivate trustworthiness are guarded by the Star of Trust. The *Seven-Colored Precious Clouds* from the *Cloud Scripture of Life’s Passage*.

The qi of Kunlun Mountain manifests in five colors, as recorded in the *Laozi’s Hidden Scripture*.

**Auspicious Clouds**
Where they gather is called a Cloud Encampment. From the Jade Chamber of Supreme Purity arise the Seven Treasures’ clouds, their hues layered tenfold, their qi fanning in nine directions. Only the Perfected Youth Xuanni may ride these precious clouds to ascend into the Heaven of Jade Purity. The one who wards off evil is the spirit within the Great Tenuity; Xuanni is the spirit of Jade Purity.

When the Lords of the Three Origins set forth on their journey, the bright sun inclines its radiance, the Eight Winds surge through the waves, their joined splendor spanning ninety thousand leagues. High in the empyrean, the dawn dances, crimson clouds spread thickly, and seven-hued yellow clouds gleam.

**Purple Buds Emit Radiance**
Crimson clouds unfurl across the sky, the Three Luminaries shine on high, and all heavens glow with light.

**Nine-Colored Clouds**
Purple and azure clouds, five-hued purple clouds, the Three Pristine clouds, the cinnabar clouds of the Dark Numinous, and the green and blue clouds of the Three Verdant hues—all recorded in the *Yuan Record of Mount Gui*.

**Early Clouds**
Eight Pristine purple clouds, seven Pristine crimson clouds, six qi green clouds, and five Pristine blue clouds, bright and clear—from the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*.

**Four Assemblies of Auspicious Empyrean**
The Eight Paths blaze with brilliance, the Three Luminaries shine in unison, and the Nine Qi glow with clarity.

**Palace of Nurtured Essence**
Within it lies the Chamber of Supreme Florescence, where blue qi arises, called the Fragrant Smoke of Reversal, its scent carried three thousand leagues against the wind.

The Ten Floral Immortals gather where purple mist congeals into palaces. The Primordial Beginning sings within the azure jade void above the Great Floating Li Land, seated upon the azure clouds.

**The Lord Emperor of the Great Tenuity**
Born within luminous clouds, enwrapped in five-colored clouds, he is also named Jade Emptiness. His true essence solidifies and his fluid consolidates; myriad thoughts revolve through the Dark Clouds, and his contemplation soars through the empyrean to ascend the void. He commands the Dark Dawn across the Ten Heavens, rides the swift lightning to rein in dragons, and through accumulated thought achieves perfection. In due course, he transmits the essentials to the Blue Youth.

**The Five Clouds**

The white cloud of the West is named Suxu;
The crimson cloud of the South is named Zhiming;
The black cloud of the North is named Xuanxiang;
The yellow cloud of the Center is named Zongsheng.

Those who know the names of the Five Clouds may summon flying plows. By meditating morning and evening, the Dark Empyrean will come to welcome them, bearing them aloft to ascend into the Grand Purity.

**Auspicious Empyrean’s Double Flight**
Vermilion orchids bloom, streaming cinnabar swirls upward, and jade clouds are infused with essence.

**Verdant Clouds Emit Nectar**
They spread across the great void, purple emptiness congeals into mist, lingering in the cinnabar chamber. The Three Luminaries illumine with penetrating brightness, and the Seven Luminaries stream with light.

**Purple Clouds Illuminate the Emperor’s Seat**
Five clouds illuminate the Nine Mysteries, the Eight Winds arise at the edge of the cosmos, and the profound clarity pervades the green pavilion.

**The Seven-Colored Precious Clouds**
The Elder of the Lower Emperor drinks the mist of the Seven Celestial Spirits and feasts upon the light of the Cavern Heavens.

**The Azure and White Dew**

Flanking it are the Nine Caverns; spontaneously arise clouds of purple and white. Cliffs birth purple cassia; ridges flourish with jasper groves. Studied the Dao under the Primordial Beginning Great King. After three thousand years, her Dao was perfected, and she returned to Kunlun.

chunks.original_text: 育清之树，叶生紫书。 西那玉国有七宝骞树，赤实白环，上有凤皇孔雀金翅乌，六时吐音。 元始五老 太上大道君、上帝高尊，十方十神，会於西丹洞阳上馆，坐明珠七色宝树下。 金根之树 琼柯玉精为实，刻题三十六国音、诸天内文。 《外国放品》 天首山 七重宝城，上生七宝树，覆城上八方之外，金刚为根株，文玉为枝条，明月为荣，夜光为叶，碑磲码脑为实，宝银珠玉并错其问。 香树璎珞音乐树 有高四里、三里、二里、一里者。 《三皇》 非方天下 有树曲合，状如交露。 金门内 有高骞树，黄气阳精，三道顺行。 东井之内 广灵之堂，中生三华高环之树，高四千丈，枝二千里，一劫则生李子而无核，食以飞仙。 所谓绛树丹实，色照五藏。 黄水四合凤脑实一枝 地穿一丈，令种之三年，生赤树如松，高五六尺，其实如梨子，白如玉，食其实，上登太微，唾地化为青玉。 《灵书紫文》 穿地八尺 取赤树子种之，灌以徊水，水丹也。 凤脑，液名也。 三年生绛树似李。 《上清三天君列纪》 柏木者 东井之精，万水之将，百草之主。 《玄中记》 槐 虚星之精也。 女贞 少阳之精，束方角，四庚三气合生此木。 梅 营室之精，合正月东方之气，众木之玉，故在木前而生花。 桑 箕精。
chunks.translated_text:
The Tree of Nurturing Clarity bears leaves inscribed with purple script. In the Western Jasper Realm stands the Seven Treasures’ Lofty Tree, its crimson fruits and white rings crowned by phoenixes, peacocks, and golden-winged crows, whose voices resound in the six watches of the day. The Primordial Beginning’s Five Elders, the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao, the August Highest Honored One, and the deities of the ten directions and ten spirits gather in the Upper Hall of the Western Cinnabar Yang Cavern, seated beneath the Seven-Colored Treasure Tree of luminous pearls.

The Golden Root Tree bears fruits of jade essence, its branches inscribed with the thirty-six nations’ tongues and the inner scriptures of all heavens.

*The Foreign Lands’ Dispersed Wonders*

Celestial Summit Mountain is encircled by sevenfold treasure-walled cities, upon which grow Seven Treasures’ Trees, their canopies overspreading the eight directions beyond the walls. Their roots and trunks are of vajra, their branches of patterned jade, their blossoms of bright moon, their leaves of night-glowing radiance, their fruits of giant clamshell, agate, and brain-incense, interspersed with silver, pearls, and jade. Fragrant Trees, Garland Trees, and Melody Trees stand at heights of four *li*, three *li*, two *li*, and one *li*.

*The Three Sovereigns*

In the Non-Directional Realm, trees curve and intertwine, their forms like interlaced dewdrops. Within the Golden Gate stands the Lofty Tree, its yellow qi and yang essence flowing in threefold alignment.

In the Eastern Well’s expanse lies the Hall of Vast Numinosity, where grows the Three-Flowered High-Ringed Tree, towering four thousand *zhang* with branches spanning two thousand *li*. Once in an *effort*, it bears plum-like fruits without pits; those who consume them ascend as flying immortals. Such is the Crimson Tree with cinnabar fruits, whose hues illumine the five viscera.

Where the four yellow waters converge, a single branch of phoenix-brain fruit is planted in a hole one *zhang* deep. After three years, it sprouts a crimson tree like a pine, five or six *chi* tall, its fruits pear-like and white as jade. Eating them grants ascent to the Supreme Subtlety; spittle cast to the ground transforms into azure jade.

*The Purple Writ of the Numinous Book*

Dig eight *chi* into the earth to plant a crimson tree seed, watering it with *huishui*—the elixir of cinnabar. Phoenix-brain is the name of its sap. After three years, a crimson tree resembling a plum grows.

*The Arrayed Records of the Three Heavenly Lords of Highest Clarity*

The cypress is the essence of the Eastern Well, the marshal of ten thousand waters, and the sovereign of a hundred herbs.

*The Mystery Within the Mysteries*

The locust tree is the essence of the Void Star. The privet is the essence of Lesser Yang, its eastern corner formed by the convergence of the four *geng* days and the threefold qi. The plum is the essence of the Encampment Mansion, harmonizing the qi of the east in the first month; the jade among trees, it blooms before all others. The mulberry is the essence of the Winnowing Basket.

chunks.original_text: 山茱萸 大火心星精，生於山润於泽，方茎叶两相对，像阴阳相配偶也。 谷木 角精。 七宝华实 作上清三洞玄经文章，食此华实，为金光仙人。 水精山 北方有小海，入大海。 又有重山，高四千里，上有水，底皆金沙，五色莲，大如轮，刺之汁出，味如蜜。 青林之华，日精三气之华 《太上九赤班符五帝内真》 三会交龙之华 《上清三天君列纪》 百草萌芽 《太上处胎业报经》 太帝抢青林之药 《大洞真经》 水泉避实归虚，北高趣下，五色水 人乌山出反魂流液。 碧海飞翠波 九龙同辔起。 东极织女之水 西尽长庚虞渊。 神芝水 天地运度。 振拖天江 《消魔》 回水玉精，零泉碧蓝 饮漱东蒙，寄乐沧浪，雌一老君。 大帝之山 有玄膺九窗之阙，外有醴泉玉浆之渊，北方玄，滋五色气之天，下有长生之渊，中有太上之家。 五帝放金龙於清泠之渊，灵宝大道君曜龙文於沧渊，东海水帝神王 姓开，讳内灵，乘蛟龙飞行云轮。 西海水帝神王 姓导，讳洞清，乘素霞飞舆。 北海水帝神王 姓喷，讳渊元，乘玄霞飞舆。 绮合台 下有万津海。 《大洞玉经》 东海 姓何，令归君。 南海 姓刘，名嚣君。 西海 姓李，名日濑君。 北海 姓吴，名禽强君。 河伯姓冯，名夷，字平君，主水。 知者不畏风波，不饥不渴。 琅碧之溪天镜国 有无州上生五芝玄涧，饮之与天地同年，中有三万仙子饮此水。 太初天中 有流汨池，广千里，水香美，中有玉树莲花十丈金莲，仙人处莲中，饮此水则五藏明彻，面生紫云。 玄州之北有帝川，玉灵仙母、金莲仙女常所游也。 西那玉国 金精玉池，飞天神人，一年三沐浴其中。 郁单国寒池 广五百里，有流精玉芝，是国男女饮池水，面如玉。 纯和国七宝池 有黑乌，青白赤黄，绿乌翠凤，音声甚妙，闻者皆生道心。 金门内有金精冶炼之池 中有石景金髓，玉膏丹芝，黄气阳精，三道顺行。 夜光液 众真歌诗。

The cornelian cherry is the essence of the Great Fire and Heart Star. It grows in mountain ravines and marshes, its square stems bearing leaves in opposing pairs, resembling the union of yin and yang.

The grain tree is the essence of the Horn Mansion.

The Seven Treasures’ blossoms and fruits compose the scriptures and texts of the Three Caverns of Supreme Clarity. Those who consume these blossoms and fruits become Radiant Golden Immortals.

The Water Essence Mountain lies north of a small sea that flows into the great ocean. There is also a layered mountain, four thousand *li* high, upon which water rests. Its base is golden sand, and five-colored lotuses, large as wheels, exude a juice like honey when pierced.

The blossoms of the Azure Forest are the flowers of the sun’s essence and the threefold *qi*.

*The Nine Vermilion Talismans of the Five Emperors and the Inner Perfected of the Supreme*

The blossoms of the Triply Converging Intertwined Dragons

*The Arrayed Records of the Three Heavenly Lords of Highest Clarity*

The sprouting of the hundred herbs

The Supreme Thearch plucks the medicines of the Azure Forest

Emerald waves soar from the azure sea as nine dragons rise abreast.

The jade essence of swirling waters, the sapphire droplets of the falling spring—

the Feminine One, the Venerable Lord.

The Mountain of the Great Thearch bears the Nine-Windowed Gate of the Mystic Gullet. Beyond lies the Abyss of Sweet Springs and Jade Nectar. In the north, the Mystic [realm] nourishes the heavens with five-colored *qi*. Below lies the Abyss of Longevity, and within dwells the home of the Supreme.

The Five Thearchs release golden dragons into the Pure and Cold Abyss. The Lord of the Numinous Treasure and Great Dao illumines the dragon’s patterns upon the Azure Abyss.

The Divine King of the Eastern Sea’s Water Thearchs—

Surname: Dao, personal name: Dongqing—rides a flying chariot of plain mist.

The Divine King of the Northern Sea’s Water Thearchs—
Surname: Pen, personal name: Yuanyuan—rides a flying chariot of dark mist.

Beneath the Brocade-Woven Terrace lies the Sea of Myriad Fordings.

*The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern*

The Eastern Sea—
Surname: He, title: Lord of Return.

The Southern Sea—
Surname: Liu, personal name: Xiaojun.

The Western Sea—
Surname: Li, personal name: Rilai.

The Northern Sea—
Surname: Wu, personal name: Qinqiang.

The River Earl—
Surname: Feng, personal name: Yi, courtesy name: Pingjun—rules over water.

The wise fear neither wind nor wave, neither hunger nor thirst.

The Azure-Gem Stream of the Heaven-Mirror Land—
Above the Land of Nothingness grows the fivefold mushrooms of the Mystic Gorge. Those who drink its waters share the lifespan of heaven and earth. Within dwell thirty thousand immortals who drink this water.

In the Center of the Primordial Heaven lies the Flowing Gush Pool, a thousand *li* wide, its waters fragrant and sweet. Within grow jade trees and ten-*zhang* lotuses of gold. Immortals dwell among the lotuses, and those who drink this water find their five viscera clarified and their faces wreathed in purple clouds.

North of the Mystic Province lies the Emperor’s River, where the Jade Nymph Immortal and the Golden Lotus Immortal Maidens often wander.

The Western Na Jade Land—
Its Golden Essence Jade Pool is where flying heavenly immortals bathe thrice yearly.

The Cold Pool of Yushan Land spans five hundred *li* and contains the flowing essence of jade mushrooms. The men and women of this land drink the pool’s water, their faces like jade.

The Seven Treasures Pool of the Pure Harmony Land—
Within dwell black crows, azure-white, red, yellow, and green birds, as well as kingfishers and emerald phoenixes. Their songs are wondrous, and all who hear them awaken the heart of the Dao.

Within the Golden Gate lies the pool of golden essence refinement. It contains stone-shadow golden marrow, jade cream, cinnabar mushrooms, yellow *qi*, and yang essence—three currents flowing in harmony.

The Night Radiance Liquid—
The hymns and poems of the assembled perfected.

chunks.original_text: 广灵堂中 下有青芝玉膏泉，旸谷神王所饮。 上仙万帝 立秋曰沐浴东井泉。 万丈谷 罗邓山下是鬼神之狱。 《金玄羽章》 玉浆之泉 天地运度。 五色流泉生洲 碧海中，扶桑水西接蓬莱生神仙之华，仙家数万人。 祖洲 在扶桑东，东海中有不死药，仙官探而服之，百年面有流光。 长洲 一名青丘，在南海辰巳地，天空之外。 炎洲 在南海中央，积火连天。 流洲 在西海南，上有仙家数万，出昆吾之石，成铁之钢，光明洞照，如水精割玉如土。 玄洲 天镜国外，上有太玄都仙伯真公所治室。 七宝色冲天 障翳日月。 《业报经》 太初天
chunks.translated_text:
Within the Hall of Vast Spirit—
Beneath flows the Azure Mushroom Jade Cream Spring, where the Spirit King of Yang Valley drinks.
The Ten Thousand Emperors of the Upper Immortals—
On the day of Autumn’s Beginning, they bathe in the Eastern Well Spring.

The Ten-Thousand-*Zhang* Valley—
Beneath Mount Luo Deng lies the prison of ghosts and spirits.

*The Golden Mystery Feathered Chapters*—
The Jade Nectar Spring governs the revolutions of Heaven and Earth.

The Five-Colored Flowing Spring arises upon an island—
Amidst the Azure Sea, west of Fusang’s waters, it borders Penglai, where the blossoms of immortals grow. Here dwell tens of thousands of transcendents.

Zu Island—
East of Fusang, within the Eastern Sea, holds the elixir of immortality. The immortal officials gather and consume it, their faces aglow with flowing radiance after a hundred years.

Long Island—
Also called Green Mound, it lies in the *chen-si* region of the Southern Sea, beyond the bounds of the celestial void.

Yan Island—
At the heart of the Southern Sea, where flames accumulate and touch the heavens.

Liu Island—
In the southern reaches of the Western Sea, where tens of thousands of transcendents reside. It yields the stone of Kunwu, which tempers iron into steel—its brilliance piercing and luminous, like crystal cutting jade as if it were earth.

Xuan Island—
Beyond the Land of the Heavenly Mirror, where the Chamber of the Supreme Mystery is governed by the True Lord, the Immortal Earl of the Great Mystery.

Seven-jeweled hues surge into the heavens—
Veiling sun and moon.

*The Sutra of Karmic Retribution*—
The Heaven of Supreme Beginning.
chunks.overlap_context:
l of the Pure Harmony Land—
Within dwell black crows, azure-white, red, yellow, and green birds, as well as kingfishers and emerald phoenixes. Their songs are wondrous, and all who hear them awaken the heart of the Dao.

Within the Golden Gate lies the pool of golden essence refinement. It contains stone-shadow golden marrow, jade cream, cinnabar mushrooms, yellow *qi*, and yang essence—three currents flowing in harmony.

The Night Radiance Liquid—
The hymns and poems of the assembled perfected.

chunks.original_text: 中有庆元之夜，河号度人之津。 玉箫云上唱 凤呜洞九遐。 金桥银柱 琉璃薄上，七宝栏格，晃晃育育，照於水中洞渊。 上清道宝经卷之二竟 上清道宝经卷之三 死生品第五 在胎九月 九气结形，形成神具。 十月诞生，九天称庆。 太一执符，帝君品命。 司命定算，五帝监生。 人禀太和阴阳之气 受五行性。 《 玄妙内篇》：九天丈人告三天玉童日：二象含真，上应九玄。 流丹九转，结气为精。 九天之精，化为人身仙胎精。 怀胞六智，法象五灵 共三万六千神。 人为道德之室宅 神人戒。 五道神形 《老子本生》 问关三道
chunks.translated_text:
Amidst this, the Night of Auspicious Origin—
The river named the Ford of Transcendent Crossing.

Jade flutes sing upon the clouds—
Phoenixes cry through the ninefold depths.

Golden bridges and silver pillars,
Atop lapis lazuli terraces,
Seven-jeweled balustrades,
Shimmering and radiant,
Illumine the abyssal waters below.

*The Scripture of the Dao and Its Treasured Mysteries, Scroll Two* concludes.
*The Scripture of the Dao and Its Treasured Mysteries, Scroll Three*
**Chapter Five: On Life and Death**

**In the Womb for Nine Months**
Nine qi coalesce into form,
Spirit and body complete.

**The Tenth Month: Birth**
The Nine Heavens rejoice.
The Great Unity holds the talisman,
The Thearch confers destiny.
The Director of Fates fixes one’s allotted years,
The Five Thearchs oversee birth.

Humans receive the harmonious qi of yin and yang,
And the nature of the Five Phases.

*From the* Inner Chapters of the Mysterious and Wondrous:
The Nine Heavens’ Venerable One addressed the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens, saying:
“The Two Images embrace the true,
Above corresponding to the Nine Mysteries.
Flowing cinnabar undergoes nine transformations,
Qi congeals into essence.
The essence of the Nine Heavens
Becomes the immortal embryo of the human body.
Six wisdoms gestate within the womb,
Modeled upon the Five Numinous Powers—
Together, thirty-six thousand spirits.”

Humans are the dwelling-place of virtue and power—
Thus the divine and human alike are bound by precepts.

**The Fivefold Dao of Spirit and Form**
*From the* Original Birth of Laozi:
“Three Passes guard the Way.”
